name: Animal Search
description:
This game was made for the KeysToTheJam 2021 game jam in 2 1/2 days by me alone. The theme of the jam was Unique Use of the Keyboard. I also went for the bonus theme of Education.

 The objective of the game is to rescue animals by typing which direction you want to go, to reach the destination on your map. It features:

  • 10 Levels
  • 2 Habitats
  • Ten animals
  • Educational cards about animals

The font used is VT323 by Peter Hull and can be downloaded for free under an OFL License at https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/vt323.
